text.text:
RAJIV MALHOTRA
Senior Banking Professional / Relationship Manager
Mumbai, India | rajiv.malhotra@email.com | +91-9XXXXXXXXX
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY
Senior Banking professional with over 13 years of experience in retail, corporate, and commercial banking
operations. Proven expertise in credit analysis, risk assessment, portfolio management, and client relationship
management. Strong track record of driving revenue growth, ensuring regulatory compliance, and delivering
customer-centric financial solutions.
CORE BANKING SKILLS
(cid:127) Retail & Corporate Banking Operations
(cid:127) Credit Appraisal & Risk Analysis
(cid:127) Loan Processing & Portfolio Management
(cid:127) Relationship & Key Account Management
(cid:127) Regulatory Compliance (RBI Guidelines)
(cid:127) Financial Analysis & MIS Reporting
(cid:127) KYC, AML & Documentation Standards
(cid:127) Core Banking Systems & Advanced Excel
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Senior Relationship Manager – ABC Bank Ltd (2017 – Present)
(cid:127) Manage a portfolio of high-value retail and corporate clients with assets under management exceeding INR 500
Crores.
(cid:127) Conduct credit appraisal, financial analysis, and risk assessment for loan proposals and working capital facilities.
(cid:127) Drive cross-selling of banking products including loans, deposits, and investment solutions.
(cid:127) Ensure strict adherence to RBI regulations, KYC norms, and internal banking policies.

Relationship Officer – XYZ National Bank (2011 – 2017)
(cid:127) Supported senior managers in handling retail and SME banking clients.
(cid:127) Processed loan applications including documentation, verification, and disbursement coordination.
(cid:127) Monitored loan portfolios and proactively addressed early warning signals to minimize NPAs.
(cid:127) Prepared MIS reports and performance dashboards for branch management.
KEY ACHIEVEMENTS
(cid:127) Increased branch loan portfolio by 28% year-on-year.
(cid:127) Maintained NPA levels below 1.5% through proactive monitoring.
(cid:127) Awarded “Top Performer – Retail Banking” for three consecutive years.
EDUCATION
(cid:127) Master of Business Administration (Finance) – NMIMS, Mumbai
(cid:127) Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com) – University of Mumbai
CERTIFICATIONS
(cid:127) Certified Credit Professional (IIBF)
(cid:127) AML & Compliance Certification
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
(cid:127) Strong customer engagement and negotiation skills
(cid:127) Experience handling audits and regulatory inspections
(cid:127) Comfortable working in high-pressure, target-driven environments
